CustomField.formula: ProductMaster__r.ProductCode__c + "_" + SUBSTITUTE( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ProductMaster__r.Account__c)), CASE( ProductMaster__r.Account__r.AllocationPriority__c, "ArrivalDate", TEXT(ArrivalDate__c), "ManufactureDate", TEXT(ManufactureDate__c), "ExpirationDate", TEXT(ExpirationDate__c), "LotNumber",DesignatedLot__c, "" ), "" ), "-", "" )
CustomField.label: 指定ロット番号
